channel.title: c++ on Signs of Improvement

item.title: Arduino Watering System
item.description: It’s not often that one gets to program with the physical world, but I must say, this project sparked a newfound appreciation for programming. For a back story, my brother has been playing around with Arduino controllers for a while now. After several projects that blew my mind, I decided to piggyback on his experience to create a project of my own; a self-sustaining watering system for plants. During the summer months in Oregon, Iâ€™ve started to enjoy growing my plants, specifically jade.
